titles.title: The World Is Longing, Seeking For Peace

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we believer into the Son, By His Spirit we are made one. When we believe into the Son, By His Spirit we are made one.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(brothers) We are one. (sisters) We are all made one, We are all made one. (all) We are one.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are dwelling in the love of the Lord. He our unity has now restored. Brothers, sisters, in one family — As the Father and the Son, always one, So are we!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
